channel.title: events on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in events on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: events
item.description: future conferences CMStatistics 2023: 16th International Conference of the ERCIM WG on Computational and Methodological Statistics (December 16-18, 2023 - Berlin, Germany) CLADAG 2023: 14th Scientific Meeting Classification and Data Analysis Group (September 11-13, 2023 - Salerno, Italy) ISI 2023: 64th ISI World Statistics Congress (July 16-20, 2023 - Ottawa, Canada) DSSV-ECDA 2023: Joint conference of Data Science, Statistics & Visualisation and the European Conference on Data Analysis (July 05-07, 2023 - Antwerp, Belgium) SIS 2023: 52nd Scientific Meeting of the Italian Statistical Society (June 21-23, 2023 - Ancona, Italy) recent events CMStatistics 2022: 15th International Conference of the ERCIM WG on Computational and Methodological Statistics (December 17-19, 2022 - London, UK) 10th VOC conference (October 14, 2022 - Tilburg, Netherlands) IFCS 2022: 17th conference of the International Federation of Classification Societies (July 19-23, 2022 - Porto, Portugal) SIS 2022: 51st Scientific Meeting of the Italian Statistical Society (June 22-24, 2022 - Caserta, Italy) EcoSta 2022: 5th International Conference on Econometrics and Statistics (June 4-6, 2022 - Kyoto, Japan) IES 2022: Innovation and Society 5.

item.title: materials and info
item.description: I am a statistician and my research is focused on the methodological and computational aspects of data analysis. The best feeling is when I can use my knowledge to solve practical and real problems. I am currently working on latent variable models, unsupervised classification and model-based composite indicators. ongoing projects software seminars and talks events teaching
